word: IN A LATER MEETING THE DOCTOR SAID HE WOULD GO AHEAD HIMSELF THROUGH SOME COMPANIES HERE WHO WERE WILLING TO PUT UP THE BUILDING ON THAT SITE AND GET THE TITLES CLEAR. BUT HE SAID HE DID NOT WANT TO DO IT UNLESS IT WAS IN ACCORD WITH THE JUDGMENT OF HIS BRETHREN IN THE MATTER, AND WISHED SOME ACTION AS TO HOW WE FELT ABOUT IT.
